course_description: Permission of Honors Coordinator required. Restricted to students who are accepted into the departmental Honors program. Fulfills ENVS Independent Study requirement (4 credit hours). May also be used to fulfill a continued writing requirement.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6011, Section #: 1, Type: RSC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: E. Saikawa, Status: Closed
